scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production prisma generate && bun build ./index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node && mkdir -p ./dist/public && cp -r ./public/* ./dist/public/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.start: docker compose up -d && bun run index.ts
scripts.db:push: docker compose up -d && prisma db push --skip-generate
scripts.db:seed: docker compose up -d && bun run prisma/seed.ts
scripts.db:reset: docker compose up -d && prisma db push --force-reset && bun run db:seed
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose up -d && prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:deploy: docker compose up -d && prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:supabase:reset: NODE_ENV=production prisma db push --force-reset && NODE_ENV=production bun run prisma/seed.ts
